creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta G. Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: mud cloth, block printed, strip woven cloth, bands of X's in brown ink; tan field; front central pocket; brown trim on sleeves
markings: \'Kelgrekulibali\' and \'alekabaraye niye\' on back in ink between bands of X\'s
title: Man's Shirt
